mapper.sql: oaid, eid, reason, begintime, endtime, orderBy, createtime, updatetime
mapper.select:
select
from tb_overtime_application where eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by orderBy desc
mapper.insert: insert into tb_overtime_application (oaid, eid, reason, begintime, endtime, orderBy, createtime, updatetime) values (#{oaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), now())

insert into tb_overtime_application
oaid,

mapper.update:
update tb_overtime_application
eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
begintime = #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

updatetime = now(),
where oaid = #{oaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
